of 8 open wings make 2 fc chain 6 r1 starting in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 5 chain chain 1 turn r2 in blo single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet chain 3 turn r3 starting in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 6 sts chain 1 turn r4 in blo single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet chain 3 turn r5 starting in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 7 sts fo with about 8 inches of tail with tail and needle make a running stitch through the 5 row ends pull tightly to gather the row together secure and use remaining tail to sew wing to body closed wings make 2 r1 in ml single_crochet 8 slip_stitch in next single_crochet chain 5 r2 pull up loop in 2nd chain from hook pull up loop in next 3 chain pull up yarn in next single_crochet of ml ring 6 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops on hook repeat 5x chain 2 r3 skip 2 chs pull up loop in blo in next single_crochet of previous row repeat 4x pull up loop in next single_crochet of ml ring 6 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops on hook repeat 5x chain 2 r4 repeat r3 fo with about 8 inches of tail with needle and tail make a running stitch through the 4 row ends then pull tail tightly to cinch ends and make a rounded wingtip secure and use remaining tail to sew wing to body pony crochet pattern janageek on ravelry com 16 31 06/09/20 page 6 of 8 figure 1 pinkie pie figure 2 applejack figure 3 rarity figure
